author: scottbw
msg: Switched two JSP scripts to UTF-8 and use a helper method for getting unicode Widget titles; this addresses issue WOOKIE-178.

author: gsim
msg: QPID-3002: Removed accidentally duplicated test code

author: scottbw
msg: Added methods for getting unicode encoded versions of strings for presentation models that don't use HTML <span> tags, using the algorithm presented in the current W3C Widgets Interface spec (see http://dev.w3.org/2006/waf/widgets-api/#getting-localizable-strings-). This contributes to both WOOKIE-20 and WOOKIE-128

author: scottkurz
msg: Improve toString() of a couple classes.

author: jgoodyear
msg: updated index, news, download, and archived pages.
